ProjectTitle: Decipher the contribution of the extracellular matrix to neuromuscular junction homeostasis and loss in Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/01/2025
Sharing: if there are no factors restricting sharing, what is the reason to sharing data as restricted data? In that case public domain is not a suitable license since this implies that reuse for any purpose is permitted. please have a look at the RDR guidance for more information https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr. For your types of data you can also consider using a disciplinary repository, those from EBI for example: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/
label: good with suggestions
